Whatever your occasion, however big or small, we have the perfect options to choose from.

Turn moments into memories!

Choose us for your next special occasion or get-together.

Got a birthday party, rehearsal dinner, corporate or other event coming up? We're a great option for your gathering! Inquire today and let us know how we can make your special occasion perfect!

PC Caribbean Delight - North Charleston, SC

Order online

Your favorite dishes, just a click away

Browse our menu, customize your order, and enjoy fresh flavors delivered straight to your door - or ready for quick pickup.
DoorDash Uber Eats groups & parties 
Celebrate together with great food

From birthdays and anniversaries to family gatherings and casual get-togethers, our space is designed to bring people together. We offer flexible seating arrangements, group-friendly menus, and a welcoming atmosphere that makes every occasion feel special.
parties catering 
Fresh flavors for every occasion

From intimate gatherings to large celebrations, our catering services bring the taste of our kitchen straight to your event. We offer a variety of menu options that can be customized to suit your guests' preferences, dietary needs, and the style of your occasion. Our team handles the details.

Reviews
Start stop reviews carousel 
Review by - Google

james:
five star review by 
This food right here is top tier! I've never had ox tails until tonight and I wasn't sure what to expect but trust me they didn't disappoint. I even danced while I ate!

Review by - Google

Marica -:
five star review by 
In the Charleston area, and looking for authentic Caribbean food comes to Caribbean Delight. Some of the best oxtail I have tasted in a long time, the rice and peas cooked to perfection. The curry goat was tender, and plantains were delicious. The staff was friendly and the food was ready quickly.

Review by - Google

jason:
five star review by 
Had a taste for oxtails for so long I had to make the 1.5 hour drive. I ordered the large oxtail plate with cabbage, rice and peas. All of it was so delicious. I was full as a tick when I was done. I 100% recommend and will be back soon.

Review by - Google

That W:
five star review by 
Stopped by here about a month ago with a friend and at first I was skeptical but let me tell you the food was delicious. Customer service was good as well. I've been back twice since then....try the jerk chicken.

Review by - Google

Edward S:
five star review by 
Small place but big food favors and excellent service and everything was great enjoyed my food only regret that I didn't get a extra to go.
